result_0:
[PYTHON]
def solve(n):
    return bin(sum(int(i) for i in str(n)))[2:]
[/PYTHON]
[TESTS]
# Test case 1:
assert solve(0) == "0"
# Test case 2:
assert solve(1) == "1"
# Test case 3:
assert solve(1000) == "1111101000"
[/TESTS]
